# vertical_alignment enumeration

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/vertical_alignment
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:07:52.554809

---

`widget` vertical alignment mode.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `vertical_alignment` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Center` | Center `widget` vertically within the slot. |
| `Top` | Align `widget` to the top of the slot. |
| `Bottom` | Align `widget` to the bottom of the slot. |
| `Fill` | `widget` fills the slot vertically. |
